original_text: For these people are not drunk, as you suppose, since it is only the third hour of the day.
korean_text: 때가 제 삼 시니 너희 생각과 같이 이 사람들이 취한 것이 아니라

sentences.original_text: For these people are not drunk
since it is only the third hour of the day
sentences.korean_translation: 아직 낮 세 시밖에 되지 않았습니다
